dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
F. Codevilla
A. López
dcterms:description: CARLA is an open-source urban driving simulator that provides a realistic environment for testing and evaluating autonomous driving agents. It includes two towns with varying weather conditions and a driving benchmark for evaluating agent performance.
dcterms:title: CARLA

dcterms:creator: F. Codevilla
M. Müller
A. López
V. Koltun
A. Dosovitskiy
dcterms:description: The Imitation Learning Dataset consists of driving data collected in the CARLA simulator, where the model learns to drive by imitating human drivers. The dataset includes images and corresponding driving controls under various weather conditions.
dcterms:title: Imitation Learning Dataset (from Codevilla et al.)
